Premanisme, Anggota Ormas di Bekasi Peras Pedagang
05 Nov 2019, 13:33 by Adi Warsono (Kontributor), Febriyan
TEMPO.CO, Bekasi - Polres Metro Bekasi Kota menangkap seorang anggota organisasi masyarakat karena terlibat aksi premanisme. Pelaku, MA, disangka melakukan pemerasan kepada pedagang di pertokoan kawasan Taman Harapan Baru, Kecamatan Medansatria.
Wakil Kepala Polres Metro Bekasi Kota, Ajun Komisaris Besar Eka Mulyana mengatakan, peristiwa pemerasan terjadi pada Sabtu lalu, 2 November 2019. Pelaku meminta uang kepada seorang pedagang sambil membawa sebilah golok.
"Sempat ingin dikasih Rp 150 ribu, tapi meminta lebih," kata Eka pada Selasa, 5 November 2019.
Menurut Eka, pelaku sempat ingin melukai korban, sehingga terjadi pergumulan. Beruntung, si pedagang tak sampai luka, sedangkan pelaku melarikan diri. Polisi yang mendapatkan laporan langsung menyelidiki kasus tersebut.
"Pelaku kami tangkap kemarin di rumahnya di Tambun," kata Eka.
Berdasarkan hasil pemeriksaan, kata dia, pelaku ketika melakukan pemerasan dalam kondisi dipengaruhi minuman keras. Untuk menakuti korban, kata dia, anggota organisasi masyarakat tersebut membawa sebilah golok yang sekarang menjadi barang bukti.
Kepala Satuan Reskrim Polres Metro Bekasi Kota, Komisaris Arman, mengatakan, polisi tak akan memberikan toleransi terhadap aksi premanisme. Ia membenarkan bahwa MA adalah anggota dari salah satu ormas. "Saya tidak bisa sebutkan ormasnya karena dia oknum," katanya.
Saat melakukan pemerasan, kata dia, MA membawa-bawa nama ormas tempatnya bernaung untuk meminta uang. Tersangka kini mendekam di sel tahanan Polres Metro Bekasi Kota. Dia pun dijerat dengan pasal berlapis Undang-undang Darurat dan pasal 335 Kitab Undang-undang Hukum Pidana. Ancamannya maksimal 20 tahun penjara.

Thugs, Members of Community Organizations in Bekasi Squeeze Traders
05 Nov 2019, 13:33 by Adi Warsono (Contributor), Febriyan
TEMPO.CO, Bekasi - Bekasi City Metro Police arrested a member of a community organization for involvement in thuggery. The perpetrator, MA, is suspected of extortion of traders in the Taman Harapan Baru shopping area, Medansatria District.
Deputy Chief of Bekasi Metro City Police, Adjunct Senior Commissioner Eka Mulyana said, the extortion incident occurred on Saturday, November 2, 2019. The perpetrator asked for money from a trader while carrying a machete.
"I wanted to be given Rp 150 thousand, but asked for more," Eka said on Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
According to Eka, the perpetrators had wanted to hurt the victim, causing a struggle. Luckily, the merchant did not get hurt, while the perpetrators fled. The police who get the report immediately investigate the case.
"We caught the culprit yesterday at his home in Tambun," said Eka.
Based on the results of the examination, he said, the perpetrators when carrying out extortion in a condition influenced by liquor. To frighten the victim, he said, members of the community organization brought a machete which is now evidence.
Head of Metro Bekasi City Police Reskrim Unit, Commissioner Arman, said that the police would not tolerate thuggery. He confirmed that the MA was a member of one of the mass organizations. "I cannot mention the mass organization because he is a person," he said.
When carrying out extortion, he said, the MA carried around the name of the mass organization where he took shelter to ask for money. The suspect is now languishing in a Bekasi Bekasi City Metro cell holding cell. He was ensnared with a layered article of the Emergency Law and article 335 of the Criminal Law Code. The threat is a maximum of 20 years in prison.
